topic.title: ZeroSafe - Git Center for Safe Network Projects on ZeroNet
topic.body:
ZeroSafe is a fork off of Git Center for Safe Network Projects for as long as the Safe Network does not have a working version and a Git Center of it's own.

Full link: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1SafeQmarbvJizjmx4TNf4DfkqzV9rLPE/
Domain by @folaht: (Thanks!)

1509649171_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
Is there still active development going on?
The last closed issue of it's own source seems to be from 2018.
